discussion.content: D: SMTP Simple Mail Transfer Protocol

questions.question_text: Which of the following protocols is used for E-mail?
Which of the following is a Cisco product that performs VPN and firewall functions?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
PIX Firewall is also a Cisco product that performs firewall and VPN functions. It is a legacy firewall product that has been replaced by Cisco ASA. PIX Firewall provides advanced security features, including stateful packet inspection, access control, and virtual private network (VPN) capabilities. It was widely used in the early 2000s and was a popular choice for small and medium-sized businesses due to its affordability and ease of use. However, as technology has evolved, PIX Firewall has been replaced by newer and more advanced firewall products, including Cisco ASA.

Netcat is the complete network configuration and information toolkit that uses multi-threaded and multi-connection technologies in order to be very fast and efficient.
Correct answer: Netcat

questions.question_text:
FILL BLANK -
Fill in the blank with the appropriate term. ________________________ is the complete network configuration and information toolkit that uses multi-threaded and multi-connection technologies in order to be very fast and efficient.
questions.answer_description:
NetRanger is the complete network configuration and information toolkit that includes the following tools: a Ping tool, Trace Route tool, Host Lookup tool, Internet time synchronizer, Whois tool, Finger Unix hosts tool, Host and port scanning tool, check multiple POP3 mail accounts tool, manage dialup connections tool,
Quote of the day tool, and monitor Network Settings tool. These tools are integrated in order to use an application interface with full online help. NetRanger is designed for both new and experienced users. This tool is used to help diagnose network problems and to get information about users, hosts, and networks on the
Internet or on a user computer network. NetRanger uses multi-threaded and multi-connection technologies in order to be very fast and efficient.

questions.question_text: Which of the following representatives of the incident response team takes forensic backups of systems that are the focus of an incident?

discussion.content: ChatGPT says A. Technical representative. I can't find a clear answer on CNDv2 book

The correct answer is: B. Lead investigator. The lead investigator is a member of the incident response team who is responsible for taking forensic backups of systems that are the focus of an incident. A forensic backup is a copy of the data on a system that is made in a way that preserves the integrity of the data, in order to be used as evidence in a legal case. The lead investigator is responsible for ensuring that the forensic backup process is carried out in a way that maintains the chain of custody, so that the authenticity and integrity of the data can be established.

questions.answer_description:
A technical representative creates forensic backups of systems that are the focus of an incident and provides valuable information about the configuration of the network and target system.
Answer option B is incorrect. A lead investigator acts as the manager of the computer security incident response team.
Answer option D is incorrect. The legal representative looks after legal issues and ensures that the investigation process does not break any law.
Answer option C is incorrect. The information security representative informs about the security safeguards that may affect their ability to respond to the incident.

questions.question_text: Which of the following is a centralized collection of honeypots and analysis tools?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
Correct me if I'm wrong: I can't find in CND Book a reference to the term "Honeyfarm", but I found it at Wikipedia:
"Honey nets and honeypots are usually implemented as parts of larger network intrusion detection systems. A honey farm is a centralized collection of honeypots and analysis tools"
